column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Bosscat did not disappoint. This is my 2nd visit here and I am equally as pleased as I was the 1st time. Today
column4: the Bosscat fries and the Donut Burger. I thoroughly enjoyed everything
column5: including the shot which contained maple bourbon
column6: orange juice on the side and a slice of bacon. The maple bourbon was extremely thick and sweet and tasted like drinking syrup. Aside from that
column7: all together it was pretty good. Although a very unique drink
column8: I probably would not order that again.
